comments:
1. build 0728_1650 and use CC client SR5
2. delete a plugin
3. checkin the library.xmi and config.xmi
4. click the config, it prompts for "file changed and need loading from systems", and choose yes
5. it shows "java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" and prompts for loading again.

Concurrent reloadings of resources was the cause. Putting resource reloading routine in synchronization fixed this.
*** Bug 152492 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

In build 0801_1350 and CC

This exception is gone and delete plugin works fine.

But there are still other exceptions seems related.  I close this one and will open a new bug
